identity.mission: Create a 'Glass Control Tower' for logistics that feels like a high-precision instrument, not a generic admin panel.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Poster clarity with Tactical HUD density.
Content is King: Data is the hero. Use negative space to let numbers breathe.
Zoom In: Focus on critical KPIs (Exceptions, Delays).
Contrast: High contrast for readability in bright warehouse environments.

theme_strategy.rationale: Light theme is standard for logistics documentation and map readability. However, we will use a 'High-Contrast' approach (Archetype 4) to avoid the 'washed out' SaaS look.

headings.usage: All page titles, card headers, and major KPIs. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Table data, descriptions, labels, inputs. Excellent for numbers and codes.

success.name: Emerald Route
success.usage: On Time, Carbon Neutral, Positive Trends

layout.structure: Sidebar Navigation (Collapsible) + Top Header + Main Content Area

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-sm px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-sm px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all

inputs.style: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-blue-600 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-600 rounded-sm h-10

tables.style: Clean, dense rows. Header uppercase & tracking-wider. Row hover: bg-slate-50.

maps.style: Full height or Large Card. Custom markers for ships/containers.

tracing_beam.description: A glowing gradient border that animates on hover or active state.

micro_interactions.hover: All interactive elements must have a visible state change (color, transform, shadow).
micro_interactions.loading: Skeleton loaders for data fetching. No spinning spinners for full pages.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Consistent size (w-5 h-5).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 for normal text. Use Slate-600 or darker on white.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible ring-2 ring-blue-600 ring-offset-2 on all interactive elements.
accessibility.aria: Use aria-labels for icon-only buttons. Semantic HTML structure.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a professional logistics dashboard. Prioritize data density and clarity over decorative fluff. Use the 'Bento' grid for the main dashboard. Ensure the map component is prominent.
instructions_to_main_agent.mock_data: Create realistic mock data for containers, orders, and financials. Do not use 'Lorem Ipsum'. Use real port names (Shanghai, Rotterdam, LA) and realistic container IDs (MSKU1234567).
instructions_to_main_agent.routing: Use 'react-router-dom' for navigation. Create a layout wrapper for the Sidebar and Header.
instructions_to_main_agent.state_management: Use React Context or simple state for this MVP. No Redux needed yet.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use 'recharts' for the financial and emissions graphs. Style them to match the color palette (Deep Ocean, Electric Blue, Emerald).
instructions_to_main_agent.maps: Use '@react-google-maps/api' or a simple iframe/mock component if API key is missing. Style the map container with rounded corners and a subtle shadow.

universal_guidelines.anti_slop: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetric grids. No 'Inter' for headings.
universal_guidelines.transitions: Use specific transitions (transition-colors, transition-transform). NEVER transition-all.
universal_guidelines.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
